name: Pumpkin Hummus
description: This pumpkin hummus with fresh parsley and sesame seeds is the perfect fall snack. It's super delicious, packed with protein, and really easy to make!

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with fresh parsley, sesame seeds, red pepper flakes, and olive oil and serve with sesame crackers or veggie sticks.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with fresh parsley, sesame seeds, red pepper flakes, and olive oil and serve with sesame crackers or veggie sticks.

keywords: how to make pumpkin hummus, pumpkin hummus, recipe for pumpkin hummus
